simpleconfig.key.__no_key_just_a_json_co: The colors also help sort the keys in the list
simpleconfig.config.title: %s §7— Config
simpleconfig.config.client.add_pause_men: Adds a button to the pause menu to open the mods list
simpleconfig.config.client.confirm:help: Configure which actions should require confirmation
simpleconfig.config.client.confirm.save:: Request confirmation before saving a config
simpleconfig.config.client.confirm.unsav: Request confirmation before closing a config with unsaved changes
simpleconfig.config.client.confirm.reset: Require a drag movement to reset an entry to its default
simpleconfig.config.client.confirm.group: Require a drag movement to reset a group/list/map of entries to its default
simpleconfig.config.client.confirm.resto:
Require a drag movement to restore an entry's value before opening the config
§7You can restore entries holding §8[§7Alt§8]§7 when clicking a reset button
simpleconfig.config.client.confirm.group:
Require a drag movement to restore a group/list/map of entries to their value before opening the config
§7You can restore entries holding §8[§7Alt§8]§7 when clicking a reset button
simpleconfig.config.client.advanced.tool:
By default tooltips are displayed when hovering any entry
Since this can become annoying, you may also require a modifier key to be held down to see the tooltips

Maximum tooltip width in screen percentage
Not live previewed
simpleconfig.config.client.advanced.pref: Maximum number of options allowed in cycling buttons before being transformed into combo boxes
simpleconfig.config.client.advanced.max_:
Configure the maximum number of options/suggestions that will be displayed in the config file's comments

§7Entries with many possible options, such as item entries may create very long comments otherwise
simpleconfig.config.client.advanced.colo:
These are the colors displayed in the color picker palette
§7You can save them from the color picker using §8[§7Right Click§8]§7
simpleconfig.config.client.advanced.sear:
Search history shared by all config screens
You may change the maximum size too
§7Setting it to §30§7 will disable the history
simpleconfig.config.client.advanced.rege:
Regular expression search history shared by all config screens
You may change the maximum size too
§7Setting it to §30§7 will disable the history
simpleconfig.config.server.desc:
By default, only server operators can modify a mod's server config. However, you may set here specific permissions for each mod/player.
§7Top level operators (%s§7 4) always have access to server configs.
simpleconfig.config.server.permissions.r:
You may define as many roles as you want.
§7A player can belong to many roles.
§7The §8"§aop§8"§7 role is reserved for server operators §8(permission level 2 or greater)
simpleconfig.config.server.permissions.m:
Creating mod groups is optional.
§7In the rules you may specify as target both, mods and mod groups.
§8Using mod groups can help make modifications in the future.
§7The §8"§a[all]§8"§7 group is reserved and includes all mods
simpleconfig.config.server.permissions.r:
Rules are applied in order, where the last wins.
§7The permission for each player for each mod is the last one that applies to both.
§7If no rules are present, only top level operators can access the config §8(permission level 4)
simpleconfig.config.permissions.test.mod: §7Players who can edit server config for mod "%s":
simpleconfig.config.server.end:
Any ingame modification of the server config by any player will produce a warning in the chat visible by all operators, which is also logged.
§7A server owner can always edit the config files by other means.
simpleconfig.config.msg.updated_by: Server config for mod "%s" has been updated by "%s"
simpleconfig.config.msg.tried_to_update_: Player "%s" tried to update Server config for mod "%s" without permission
simpleconfig.config.msg.error_updating_b: Unexpected error updating Server config for mod "%s" by operator "%s":\n%s
simpleconfig.config.msg.error_updating_f: Unexpected error updating Server config for mod "%s":\n%s
simpleconfig.config.msg.client_changes_r: Some of your last config changes may require a restart to be effective
simpleconfig.config.msg.server_changes_r: Some of the config changes may require a restart to be effective
simpleconfig.ui.confirm_save.msg: Are you sure you want to save these changes?
simpleconfig.ui.keyboard.title: Controls
simpleconfig.ui.keyboard.body:
§l§nGeneral§r
§3Esc§8:§r Discard changes
§3Ctrl + S§8:§r Save changes
§3Ctrl + Z§8:§r Undo
§3Ctrl + Y§8:§r Redo

§l§nSearch§8:§r 
§3Ctrl + F§8:§r Search
§3Up/Down, Enter/Shift + Enter§8:§r Select next/previous result
§3Alt + C§8:§r Toggle case sensitivity
§3Alt + T§8:§r Toggle search within tooltips
§3Alt + R§8:§r Toggle Regex search §7(Java)§r

§l§nNavigation§r
§5[Alt] +§3 Up/Down§8:§r Navigate entries §7(Alt helps when entries use Up/Down)§r
§5[Alt] +§3 Left§8:§r Navigate to parent/Collapse group
§5[Alt] +§3 Right§8:§r Expand group
§3Ctrl + Alt + Up/Down§8:§r Move list entries
§3Middle/Alt + Left drag§8:§r Move list entries
§3Ctrl + Pg Up/Pg Down§8:§r Change tabs

§l§nColor Picker§r
§3Left Click§8:§r Use palette/history color
§3Right Click§8:§r Save palette color
§3Middle Click§8:§r Delete palette color

§l§nHelp§r
%s§8:§r Display help tooltip §7(configurable in Simple Config's client settings)§r
simpleconfig.preset.dialog.saving.title: Saving preset
simpleconfig.preset.dialog.saving.remote:
Uploading preset §7"§3%s§7"§r to the server
This shouldn't take long
simpleconfig.preset.dialog.loading.title: Fetching preset
simpleconfig.preset.dialog.loading.remot:
Fetching preset §7"§3%s§7"§r from the server
This shouldn't take long
simpleconfig.preset.dialog.deleting.remo:
Deleting preset §7"§3%s§7"§r from the server
This shouldn't take long
simpleconfig.preset.dialog.overwrite.loc:
A§a client§r preset named §7"§3%s§7"§r already exists§a locally§r
Do you want to overwrite it?

A§b server§r preset named §7"§3%s§7"§r already exists§a locally§r
Do you want to overwrite it?
simpleconfig.preset.dialog.overwrite.rem:
A§a client§r preset named §7"§3%s§7"§r already exists§b in the server§r
Do you want to overwrite it?

A§b server§r preset named §7"§3%s§7"§r already exists§b in the server§r
Do you want to overwrite it?
simpleconfig.preset.dialog.delete.confir: The§a client§r preset §7"§3%s§7"§r will be deleted§a locally§r.
The§b server§r preset §7"§3%s§7"§r will be deleted§a locally§r.
The§a client§r preset §7"§3%s§7"§r will be deleted§b from the server§r.
The§b server§r preset §7"§3%s§7"§r will be deleted§b from the server§r.
simpleconfig.preset.picker.label: Preset picker
simpleconfig.preset.load.label: Load preset
simpleconfig.preset.save.label: Save preset
simpleconfig.preset.dialog.mistaken.remo:
A preset named §8"§7%s§8"§r already exists§a locally§r
Are you sure you want to create a new one with the same name§b in the server§r?
simpleconfig.preset.dialog.mistaken.loca:
A preset named §8"§7%s§8"§r already exists§b in the server§r
Are you sure you want to create a new one with the same name§a locally§r?
simpleconfig.file.dialog.title: Edit config file manually
simpleconfig.file.dialog.body:
Open file §8"§7%s§8"§r
§6Changes made in the GUI are not synced with the file§r
If you're planning to edit the file directly, save or discard the current changes before altering the file
simpleconfig.config.text.greeting_text: This is a demo config with examples for mod developers
The following are examples of supported config entry types

All number types support sliders,
as long as their bounds are finite
Sliders may display different text in their widgets.
Enums may define their own translations
String entries may suggest possible values
String entries may also be restricted to a finite set of values
An entry may be restricted to a finite set of values using an enum-like interface

Lists may contain any other entry type that has an entry in the config file
This only excludes static text messages and non persistent boolean entries
List of color lists with captions

Types serializable as strings
You may define your own serializers

Combo boxes support advanced text search
Try typing '§3gapple§r' in this combo box
Hitting 'Ctrl + Space' or 'Enter' will trigger autocompletion

Item entries can also allow unknown items
(For example, belonging to unloaded mods)

Maps may contain any other entry type that is serializable as NBT
This currently includes all built-in types and all string-serializable types
Map keys can be any entry type that serializes as strings except other lists or maps
Of course, maps may contain lists
Map of maps of divisible integers

Of course, maps may contain other maps
However, don't push it too far, or the config will stop being§o simple§r
Additionally, this map only allows integers divisible by the caption entry

The keys to a map can be almost any other kind of entry
Obviously, not other lists or maps
There are also pair lists, which allow duplicate keys
Maps can be linked, preserving their order

Any entry can be made %s, appearing only in the GUI and being reset on every restart
This can be useful to enable special debug/profiling features you wouldn't wish to leave on accidentally

Button entries can run an arbitrary action
For example, they may modify the values of other entries
Non persistent entries may have a button to run any arbitrary action taking the entry value as parameter
The entry above multiplies all elements of this list

Presets can modify the values of other entries
This demo presets affect the following group of entries
These entries can be set using the preset entry above
simpleconfig.config.client.demo.errors_t: You may click here to open the %s for no specific reason
Entries may define custom restrictions and error messages

An entry's validation may rely on other entries
For example, you cannot set a greater min than max

An entry's validation may rely on other entries
For example, you cannot set a greater min than max
List entries may also define a validator for its elements, as well as for the whole list

Some entries require a restart to be effective
You'll be notified about it when you save your changes
This entry can disable the one below it
This entry is only editable when the above is §aTrue

Hello, %s!
Tooltips may be dynamic
There are various ways to achieve this
simpleconfig.config.client.demo.end: Are you a mod developer willing to create your own §o§5Simple Config§r? You can check how this config was made at the %s
simpleconfig.config.server.demo.greeting:
This is a demo config with examples for mod developers
Only server operators can access server-side config
simpleconfig.config.text.some_other_text:
Some entries may require a restart to be effective
The user is warned about this when saving changes
simpleconfig.config.server.demo.demo_gro:
A baker method may be used to translate entry units
For example, this entry is translated to m/tick on bake
simpleconfig.config.text.some_complex_te: You may use the command "%s" to summon a pink sheep
